title: Jonathan Greer Memorial Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students enrolled in the Leeds School at the University of Colorado Boulder, in memory of Jonathan Greer. Preference will be given to students who are focusing their studies in entrepreneurship.
marketingContent: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students enrolled in the Leeds School at the University of Colorado Boulder, in memory of Jonathan Greer. Preference will be given to students who are focusing their studies in entrepreneurship.
